attributes.action: let jon and ashley bartlett keep their family home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: jon and ashleys mothers died shortly before christmas now because of a sucession law its ridiculous the boys have lived there for most of there lives they have grown up in this house have wonderful memories of their mother and the council want to evict them they are both hard working young men who are willing to pay their way in this world

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
